choices: A bright flash appeared and took them to mobius
1.content:
Chris and Miley were watching tv.

Then...
1.title: Start!

choices: They wake up and Sonic finds them
They wake up and Tails finds them
11.content:
Chris:Miley? You have a cool house and all, but whats happening to your tv?
Miley:I don't know.
Suddenly, somebody jumped out of Miley's computer.
Miley:WTF!? MAISIE!?
Maisie:Hi Miley. Hi Chris.
Chris:Hi.
Maisie:What is going on?
Chris:Well, me and Miley were watching Sonic X, but then this happened to her tv.
Maisie:Huh? Why can't I go back to the computer?
The 3 kids felt like they were getting pulled.
Chris:Are we getting sucked inside Miley's tv?
Miley:HOW!?
Chris, Miley, and Maisie:AHHHHHHHHHH!!!!!!!!!!
The 3 kids were sucked inside the tv.
11.title: A bright flash appeared and took them to mobius

111.content:
Maisie: seriously, what the heck is wrong with my tv!?
Miley: well mine in this case.
Sonic: hello again
111.title: They wake up and Sonic finds them

1111.content:
Chris:SONIC! IT'S GREAT TO SEE YOU AGAIN!
Sonic:Yeah. It's great to see the 3 of you again.
Miley:Any new adventures for us?
Sonic:Yep. We get to kick Dr Eggman's butt again.
Maisie:YAY! Lets go!
Sonic:Our new adventure will start at Tails'workshop. I will race the 3 of you to Tails' workshop.
Chris:Lets do this thing!
The race started.
1111.title: Continue

11111.content:
Chris:YES! SPEED IS MY MIDDLE NAME! LOL!
Maisie:Heh.
Sonic:Come on. Tails was waiting for us.
Miley:Ok.
11111.title: Chris Wins!

111111.content: (Tails) Hello my friends we have info that Dr. Eggman is planning to attack Mobius again. (Chris) Does he ever learn? (Sonic) Apparnetly Not but we have someone on the inside coming to give us info on the first target. (Then a black mist surrounds the gang) (Miley) Whats happening? (Sonic) Our mole is here. (Then a black and grey hedgehog appears)
111111.title: Continue

1111111.content: (Maise) Who is that? (Sonic) This is our insider. (???) Not anymore, they found out, my brother noticed me. (Tails) Raditiz saw you and he's working with Eggman! (???) Yes and now I am working with you. (Maise and Miley) What your name (looking into his ruby red eyes) (???) I am Hypon the Hedgewolf.
1111111.title: Continue

choices: They became hedgehogs, but with a side affect!
11111111.content:
Tails:We cant let Eggman find out that you, Chris, and Maisie are here.
Miley:Ok.
Tails:So I made these 3 potions that will turn the 3 of you into hedgehogs.
Miley:AWESOME!
Maisie:COOL!
Chris:GIVE ME THE POTION SO I CAN DRINK IT!
The 3 kids drank the potion and...
11111111.title: Continue

111111111.content: All three drank the potions and there bodys and clothes changed. Chris looks kinda like if Sliver had a brother and the Maise looked like Sonia if she was younger. But Miley looked like a mix of Hedgehog and wolf like Hypon. (Hypon) Now they're going to need new names as well
111111111.title: They became hedgehogs!

1111111111.content: (Tails) What do u mean Hypon? (Hypon) Eggman knows there names so if they keep there names he'll know somethings up. (Sonic) Better safe than Sorry,Tails. (Hypon looks at the three "hedgehogs" and tried to think but he couldnt after looking into Miley's eyes.
1111111111.title: Continue

11111111111.content: The three hedgehog couldnt think of good names so Tails named Chris to Nitro, Sonic named Maise to Amber and Hypon named Miley to Tabithia. (Nitro) Ok now we got that done, What did you find out? (Hypon) I saw they were planning to attack my hometown of Chun-cun.
11111111111.title: Continue

111111111111.content:
Nitro (Chris):I LUV OUR MADE UP NAMES!
Tabithia (Miley):We better help Hypon.
Amber (Maisie):Shes right. Lets go.
Everybody left, however, Chris was still at the workshop.
Nitro (Chris):(drinks potion) My hedgehog color looks better now as blue. I look like a younger version of Sonic!
Tails:Hey Chris! Whoa. What happened to you?
Nitro (Chris):I drank a potion that changed my hedgehog color to blue. BLUE IS MY FAVORITE COLOR!
Tails:(in mind) This is not good.
Sonic:C'mon! Cool! You look much better as a blue hedgehog!
Nitro (Chris):Thanks!
Little did Chris know that there was a side affect to the blue potion.
111111111111.title: Continue

Tails:This is Classic Chris. He knows how to spek French.

Amber:Thanks.

Raditiz:?????

Raditiz:?????

Classic Chris:Metal Sonic.
Amber:Thank you. (leaves)

112111.content:
When they get to Tails house they see a human girl that they hadn't seen before. She comes up and examines both of them before finally speaking.
Shine: Hello. What are your names?
Chris: I am Chris.Nice to meet you. And this is...
Miley: I can introduce myself thank you. I am Miley. Nice to meet you to.
Girl: My name i9s Shine. Good to meet you as well. Question for you both. Has either one of you seen a Blood-Night Hedgewolf anywhere? His name is Hypon and me and him was supposed to help Tails today, but I can't find him. So I was kinda hoping y'all had seen him.
112111.title: Continue

1121111.content:
Miley: No. I have a question for you.
Shine: what?
Miley: Have you seen a girl with long brown hair with clothes made out of leaves and a boy with dirty blond hair with clothes made out of leaves? They are brother and sister.
